rules_text:
[i]Gale Winds[/i] – Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures.
[i]Grafcalibur[/i] – Whenever Asbel, Windswept Magi attacks, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.
